rules.description: Double tap on left_shift -> escape, single tap -> left_shift, hold -> normal shift
(Vim 1/11) Double press on ctrl activates Vim mode, holding ctrl keeps normal control function
(Vim 2/11) finger on trackpad + any key -> off
Change spacebar to left_shift. (Post spacebar if pressed alone)
Double tap on left_shift -> escape, single tap -> left_shift, hold -> normal shift
(Vim 1/11) Double press on ctrl activates Vim mode, holding ctrl keeps normal control function
(Vim 2/11) finger on trackpad + any key -> off
Change spacebar to left_shift. (Post spacebar if pressed alone)
Double tap on left_shift -> escape, single tap -> left_shift, hold -> normal shift
(Vim 1/11) Double press on ctrl activates Vim mode, holding ctrl keeps normal control function
(Vim 2/11) finger on trackpad + any key -> off
Change spacebar to left_shift. (Post spacebar if pressed alone)
Double tap on left_shift -> escape, single tap -> left_shift, hold -> normal shift
(Vim 1/11) Double press on ctrl activates Vim mode, holding ctrl keeps normal control function
(Vim 2/11) finger on trackpad + any key -> off
Change spacebar to left_shift. (Post spacebar if pressed alone)
